LinkedArticleHistory.name: LinkedArticleHistory
LinkedArticleHistory.description: Represents the history of changes made to tracked fields on a linked article.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed.

LinkedArticleId.description: The ID of the tracked linked article. The history is displayed on the detail page for this record.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The value of the field before it was changed.
